Class CompanyRepRegistrationBoundary

java.lang.Object
boundary.BaseBoundary
boundary.CompanyRepRegistrationBoundary
public class CompanyRepRegistrationBoundary extends BaseBoundary
Boundary responsible for signing up new company representatives. This runs without authentication and validates basic input before forwarding registration requests to the controller.

This boundary provides a user-friendly registration interface for company representatives to create new accounts. The registration process includes:

  • Comprehensive input validation for all fields
  • Email format verification and uniqueness checking
  • User confirmation before submission
  • Cancellation support at any point during registration
  • Clear feedback on registration status and next steps
Registered accounts are created with PENDING status and require approval from Career Center staff before they can be used to access the system.

  • Method Details

    • signupCompanyRep

      public void signupCompanyRep()
      Runs the interactive sign-up flow for company representatives.

      This method guides users through the complete registration process:

      1. Prompts for personal and company information
      2. Validates all input fields
      3. Checks email uniqueness
      4. Displays confirmation summary
      5. Submits registration to controller
      6. Provides success feedback and next steps
      Users can cancel the registration at any point by entering "0" or "cancel". Upon successful registration, accounts are created with PENDING status and require Career Center staff approval before login is permitted.
      See Also:
      • promptNonEmpty(String)
      • promptEmail()
      • CompanyRepRegistrationController.registerCompanyRep(String, String, String, String, String)
